summary: drm/bridge: megachips: Fix a null pointer dereference bug
details:
drm/bridge: megachips: Fix a null pointer dereference bug

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.262 by commit 5bc20bafcd87ba0858ab772cefc7047cb51bc249, it was introduced in version v4.19.226 by commit 16e3827904932eccfba0915f0c93b519de3536ac. For more details please see the references link.
